title: Mission: Christmas Proposal
description: Nothing can be so simple as a Christmas Eve proposal when B.O.T.s is involved.Bree is the perfect woman for Joseph--if only he could convince her that getting married makes sense. Maybe taking her back to the place where they fell in love will help.Even as his plan is put into motion, it begins to unravel. Find out how wrong things can go for this Mr. Right!*Contains bonus prequel.** Release week bonus story included -- get it before it's gone.
author: Lucy McConnell
